title: Spatial metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for processing metrics of an assay that includes sequences linked to spatial coordinates.

total_spots_under_tissue.title: Number of Spots Under Tissue
total_spots_under_tissue.description: The number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.

mean_reads_per_spot.title: Mean Reads per Spot
mean_reads_per_spot.description: The number of reads, both under and outside of tissue, divided by the number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.

mean_reads_under_tissue_per_spot.title: Mean Reads Under Tissue per Spot

median_genes_per_spot.title: Median Genes per Spot
median_genes_per_spot.description: The median number of genes detected per spot under tissue-associated barcode. Detection is defined as the presence of at least 1 UMI count.

median_umi_counts_per_spot.title: Median UMI Counts per Spot
median_umi_counts_per_spot.description: The median number of UMI counts per tissue covered spot.

frac_reads_in_spots_under_tissue.title: Fraction Reads in Spots Under Tissue
frac_reads_in_spots_under_tissue.description: The fraction of valid-barcode, confidently-mapped-to-transcriptome reads with spot-associated barcodes.
